title: How to Draw a Logo in Microsoft Paint

steps.title: Hold "Shift" Key and drag while holding down the left arrow key to draw a circle.
steps.content: Hold "Shift" Key and drag while holding down the left arrow key to draw a circle.

steps.title: Select the Paint Bucket and fill the circle with a color of your choice.
steps.content: Select the Paint Bucket and fill the circle with a color of your choice.

steps.title: Draw another circle inside the previous circle.
steps.content: Draw another circle inside the previous circle.

steps.title: Select the text tool and type the name of your business, website or blog.
steps.content: Select the text tool and type the name of your business, website or blog.

steps.title: Save your image and you're done.
steps.content: Save your image and you're done.
